summary: Jane E. Godfrey was an employee of the Select Committee on Assassinations (SCAS). She is listed in multiple payroll certification reports from 1978 and 1979. These documents provide her name, and in some cases, her social security number, position, salary, and employment dates within the SCAS. The documents indicate her employment spanned from at least April 1978 to January 1979.
significance: Jane E. Godfrey's significance lies in her employment with the Select Committee on Assassinations, indicating her involvement in the investigation, though the specific nature and extent of her role are not detailed in the provided documents.
